chunk:
Vivant Skincare, Mandelic Acid  3-in-1 Exfoliating Cleasner

Brand: Vivant

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Water, Ammonium Lauryl Sulfate, Acrylates Copolymer, Cellulose Acetate, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Mandelic Acid, Propylene Glycol, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Fruit Extract, Honey Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol,

Glycol, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Fruit Extract, Honey Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin

Directions: Apply to face or body with fingertips. Work into lather and massage into skin. Rinse thoroughly. For acne of the chest and back, leave on for a few minutes before rinsing.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
